actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to establish as part of the congressional internship program an internship program for senior citizens in honor of John McCormack.

summary.text: Authorizes each Member of the House of Representatives to hire either one additional employee for two weeks in any year, or two additional employees for one week, to be known as John McCormack congressional interns in honor of the former Speaker of the House of Representatives. Provides for payment of compensation to such interns at a rate not to exceed $100 per week. States that each such intern must be sixty years of age or older and a resident of the district which the employing member represents.

titles.title: Resolution to establish as part of the congressional internship program an internship program for senior citizens in honor of John McCormack.
